Class JavaFXXiangqiDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaFXXiangqiDisplay
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JavaFXChessboardDisplay

    public class JavaFXXiangqiDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaFXChessboardDisplay
    This class represents the way a Xiangqi board is supposed to look like
